name: Woodburning Kit
description: This project will help you get more familiar with using the woodburner. You will learn some burning techniques, have the chance to practice with the woodburner, and finish with a completed art piece.

name: Vacuum Forming Pot
description: Become familiarized with vacuum forming by creating a plastic plant pot with a customizable buck!

name: Mancala Board
description: Use the Dremel to sand and finish a wooden mancala board â€” a fun functional project.

name: Pencil Pouch
description: Learn basic setup and stitching on the sewing machine by making your own pencil pouch.

name: Leather Keychain
description: Practice leather crafting using a hole punch and rivet setter to create a keychain.
